>Construction of pCSC2
//P_cscK driving amilGFP
acquire oligo csc1
acquire oligo csc2
acquire oligo csc5
acquire oligo csc6
acquire plasmid Mach1_gen
acquire plasmid p20N91
PCR csc1,csc2 on p20N91	(2907bp, amil)
PCR csc5,csc6 on Mach1_gen	(210bp, PcscK)
Assemble amil,PcscK	(BsmBI, pCSC2)
Transform pCSC2	(Mach1, Kan)
---
